description: Contains a list of IP addresses. This can be either IPV4 or IPV6. The list will be mutually

EntityName.markdownDescription:
Name of the IPSet.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^[0-9A-Za-z_-]{1,128}$  
Update requires: No interruption

EntityDescription.markdownDescription:
Description of the entity.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9=:#@/\-,.][a-zA-Z0-9+=:#@/\-,.\s]+[a-zA-Z0-9+=:#@/\-,.]{1,256}$  
Update requires: No interruption

EntityId.markdownDescription:
Id of the IPSet

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^[0-9a-f]{8}-(?:[0-9a-f]{4}-){3}[0-9a-f]{12}$  
Update requires: No interruption

Scope.description: Use CLOUDFRONT for CloudFront IPSet, use REGIONAL for Application Load Balancer and API Gateway.
Scope.markdownDescription:
Use CLOUDFRONT for CloudFront IPSet, use REGIONAL for Application Load Balancer and API Gateway.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: CLOUDFRONT | REGIONAL  
Update requires: No interruption

IPAddressVersion.description: Type of addresses in the IPSet, use IPV4 for IPV4 IP addresses, IPV6 for IPV6 address.
IPAddressVersion.markdownDescription:
Type of addresses in the IPSet, use IPV4 for IPV4 IP addresses, IPV6 for IPV6 address.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: IPV4 | IPV6  
Update requires: No interruption

IPAddress.markdownDescription:
IP address

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 50  
Update requires: No interruption

ResourceArn.markdownDescription:
ARN of the WAF entity.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

Key.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Addresses.markdownDescription:
List of IPAddresses.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Tags.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption
